ApiKeyWarn: Warning: Der Schlüssel wird nur einmal angezeigt. Bitte sofort speichern.
Name: Name
AdminViewOnly: Nur Adminstratoren können diese Seite anzeigen.
ApiKeyShowMsg: API keys should be added to the request header when making API calls.  Der Schlüssel sollte sein "Authorization", und Wert sein sollte "{key-id}:{key-secret}".  Note the colon in between.
File size must be under 1 MB: Die Dateigröße muss unter 1 MB liegen
ResetBrandConfirm: Möchten Sie das Branding wirklich auf die Standardeinstellungen zurücksetzen?
The below open-source projects are used: Die folgenden Open-Source-Projekte werden in Remotely verwendet.
If you've contributed to any of these pr: Wenn Sie zu einem dieser Projekte beigetragen haben, vielen Dank!
Enter a device ID to see its details: Geben Sie eine Geräte-ID ein, um ihre Details anzuzeigen.
You can also go directly to a device's d: Sie können auch direkt die Details eines Geräts aufrufen.
Right-clicking a device card on the main: Rechtsklick auf eine Gerätekarte auf der Hauptseite, während sie minimiert ist
Clicking the \"Open in New Tab\" button: Klicken auf die Schaltfläche "In neuem Tab öffnen" in der Kopfzeile einer Gerätekarte, während sie maximiert ist
Device must be online to retrieve logs: Das Gerät muss online sein, um Protokolle abzurufen
Instant desktop sharing. No account req: Instant desktop sharing.  Kein Konto erforderlich.
Must be built from source to target spec: Must be built from source to target specific server URL.
Note: Only the default organization's br: Note: Only the default organization's branding will apply to these.
Installable background agents that provi: Installable background agents that provide unattended access and remote scripting.
Zum Download muss man eingeloggt sein.
Note: GPU-accelerated screen capture and: Note: GPU-accelerated screen capture and PowerShell Core is unavailable on Windows 7.
An error occurred while processing your: An error occurred while processing your request.
DevelopmentDesc:
Swapping to theDevelopment environment displays detailed information about the error that occurred.

The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications.It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users.For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Developmentand restarting the app.
Device ID is missing. Please use a vali: Device ID is missing.  Please use a valid shortcut to the support page, which will include the device ID.
You've successfully joined the organizat: Die Registrierung in der Organisation war erfolgreich!
You will leave your current organization: You will leave your current organization and lose access to its agents unless someone is able to invite you back in.
Are you sure you want to leave your curr: Are you sure you want to leave your current organization and join this one?
Only organization administrators can vie: Only organization administrators can view this page.
Are you sure you want to delete this inv: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation?
Are you sure you want to delete this dev: Are you sure you want to delete this device group?
Are you sure you want to delete this use: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
NOTE: Give this URL to the user. They m: NOTE: Give this URL to the user.  They must be logged out completely for it to work.
ShowDefaultOrgHelp: This option is only available for server administrators.  When selected, it sets this organization as the default for the server.  If the organization can't be determined in the quick support apps, they will use the default organization's branding.
DeviceGroupHelp: Device groups can be used to restrict user permissions and to filter computers on the main page. Everyone will have access to devices that are not in a group.  Only administrators and users in a device group will have access to devices in that group.
ShowInvitesHelp: All pending invitations will be shown here and can be revoked by deleting them. If a user does not exist, sending an invite will create their account and add them to the current organization.A password reset URL can be generated from the user table.The Admin checkbox determines if the new user will have administrator privileges in this organization.
ShowRelayCodeHelp: This relay code will be appended to EXE filenames.  If the clients were built from source and have the server URL embedded, they will use this code to look up your organization's branding to use.
ShowUsersHelp: All users for the organization are managed here Administrators will have access to this management screen as well as all computers.
View Only title: If toggled, prevents sending commnads and input to the remote computer.
Clipboardtitle: Type the current clipboard text on the remote computer.
Invite Otherstitle: Kopieren Sie einen Link, über den eine andere Person den Remote-Bildschirm anzeigen kann.
Audiotitle: Nur Windows. Streamen Sie das Remote-Audio zum Browser.
File Transfertitle: Übertragen Sie Dateien auf den Remote-Computer .
ctrlAltDelButtontitle: Simulate the Ctrl+Alt+Del command on the remote computer.
Stream Modetitle: Reduce bandwidth and increase FPS, but increase input delay.
Monitorstitle: Switch monitors on remote multi-monitor setups.
Fittitle: If toggled, will resize image to fit in the window.
Starttitle: Record session as a WEBM video in the browser.
Downloadtitle: Download the recorded session as a WEBM file.
Add banned device ID, name, or IP: Add banned device ID, name, or IP
Require Authentication on Remote Control: Require Authentication on Remote Control Page
This sometimes needs to be disabled for: This sometimes needs to be disabled for Let's Encrypt certificates.
Are you sure you want to delete all logs: Möchten Sie wirklich alle Protokolle löschen?
Shown to clients instead of your email: Shown to clients instead of your email
modalText: The shell shortcuts are used to quickly switch between terminal shells on the main page.If you type one of these shortcuts into the terminal, it will select the corresponding command mode (e.g. PowerShell Core, Bash, etc.).
Zwei-Faktor Authentifikation erforderlich.  Click the button below to set up your authenticator app.
Use a local account to log in.
To use an authenticator app go through t: To use an authenticator app go through the following steps:
Download a two-factor authenticator app: Download a two-factor authenticator app like Microsoft Authenticator for
Scan the QR Code or enter this key: Scan the QR Code or enter this key
into your two factor authenticator app. Spaces and casing do not matter.
Once you have scanned the QR code or inp: Once you have scanned the QR code or input the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide you with a unique code. Enter the code in the confirmation box below.
Are you sure you want to uninstall this: Are you sure you want to uninstall this agent?  This is permanent!
You must select at least one device or d: You must select at least one device or device group.
Creator: Creator
The password and confirmation password d: The password and confirmation password do not match.
The {0} must be at least {2} and at max: The {0} must be at least {2} and at max {1} characters long.
The true field is not a valid e-mail add: The true field is not a valid e-mail address.
Enter a name for your organization: Geben Sie einen Namen für Ihre Organisation ein
Geben sie ihre E-Mail Adresse ein.
There are no outdated devices currently: Derzeit sind keine veralteten Geräte online.
